mapper.select: SELECT delivery_address_id AS deliveryAddressId, delivery_name AS deliveryName, postal_code AS postalCode, address, detail_address AS detailAddress, default_address_status AS defaultAddressStatus, recipient, recipient_contact AS recipientContact, delivery_request AS deliveryRequest, user_id AS userId FROM delivery_address WHERE delivery_address_id = #{deliveryAddressId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery_address ( delivery_name, postal_code, address, detail_address, default_address_status, recipient, recipient_contact, delivery_request, user_id ) VALUES ( #{deliveryName}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{defaultAddressStatus}, #{recipient}, #{recipientContact}, #{deliveryRequest}, #{userId} )
